ComicInfo.Summary: The all-out, no holds barred confrontation with Discordia - as the lives of Adam's sister and the all-American superhero, Crashman, hang in the balance. But when Adam sees an unexpected vision, will he be able to remain focused on the mission at hand? The cosmic superhero epic of our time continues! AD COPY: YOU WANT COSMIC? WE GOT COSMIC!
